subject: Re: running junit test via command line
msgSnippet: Your order of arguments is wrong. -D arguments must come before the main class. java -cp jarfile.jar -DinputFile=file.txt org.junit.runner.JUnitCore

Your order of arguments is wrong. -D arguments must come before the main cl=
ass.
java -cp jarfile.jar -DinputFile=3Dfile.txt org.junit.runner.JUnitCore=
 junit.test.to.run
